artist_name: Bryan Scary and the Shredding Tears
metrics_conclusion: The Purple Rocket has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Melodic Complexity and Chord-Melody Tension.
key_conclusion: The Purple Rocket has sections analyzed in the following keys: C Mixolydian, G Minor,  and F Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
